title: How will the classes be shuffled from 3rd sem onwards?

comments.body: Sections in each branch are sorted alphabetical wise, roughly 60 kids per class
Alphabetical order was there because of Online Classes...
It's very random, just fingers crossed and hope you get a good section!
Wasn't SRN wise for 2 batches after mine (2022)

I've heard that they try to balance the sections in terms of academic performance as well. 

Specifically, all sections would have a similar number of students with 5-6CGPA, 6-7CGPA, 7-8CGPA, and so on.
Isn't SRN wise basically alphabetical? Or will they look at first name first and then last name?

Your SRN is alphabetical? If that's the case then SRN wise will be the same as normal alphabetical order.

Our SRNs weren't alphabetical. And neither was our separation into classes in alphabetical order. Ours is distributed almost randomly into all the sections.
